org.sonatype.restsimple.api
Class ServiceHandler

java.lang.Object
  org.sonatype.restsimple.api.ServiceHandler
Direct Known Subclasses:
DeleteServiceHandler, GetServiceHandler, HeadServiceHandler, PostServiceHandler, PutServiceHandler
public abstract class ServiceHandler
extends Object

Represent how a REST resource handles requests. A ServiceHandler is used when mapping the request to an Action.

          Create a new ServiceHandler

producing

public ServiceHandler producing(MediaType mediaType)
Add a MediaType this ServiceDefinition. MediaType are used when writing the response and maps the HTTP response's content-type header.

Parameters:

consumeWith

public <T> ServiceHandler consumeWith(MediaType mediaType,
                                      Class<T> clazz)
Unmarshall the request's body into an Object of type T.

Parameters:
mediaType - A media type that will be used for deserializing the resquest's body.
clazz - a Class that will be instanciated and populated by the request's body.
